title: I visited the largest collection of public telescopes in the US in Oregon's high desert, and the dark skies blew me away
description: Located south of Bend’s outdoor playland, I visited this Pacific Northwest gem for an enchanted winter evening of astronomical wonders
content: Located south of Bend’s outdoor playland, I visited this Pacific Northwest gem for an enchanted winter evening of astronomical wonders
